subject: My "experiments"
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Not really an experiment, since there is no control, just the ever present
"hope this works more better". Using an amplifier from a computer monitor to
try to get fuller sound. This was the tuner from Quija Box, it was working
last night, and today no work. So replaced it with another Timex Tuner
module.

 F-S
